title: Stormy Daniels Hits Record Ratings on 60 Minutes, Fool #1 has to get his Comb and Brush, Civil Rights Attorney Benjamin Crump Talks to the Show and more!
itunes:title: Stormy Daniels Hits Record Ratings on 60 Minutes, Fool #1 has to get his Comb and Brush, Civil Rights Attorney Benjamin Crump Talks to the Show and more!
description:
The show continues to talk about Trump and his indiscretions. Attorney Benjamin Crump discusses the Sacramento shooting with the crew. We find out more details about the Royal Wedding and more!
